name: PatientReasonForNotCompletingTreatmentSummaryReport
title: Patient Reason for not Completing Treatment Summary Report

concept.display: Performance Measure Exclusion Modifier due to Patient Reasons
Treatment summary report communicated to physician(s) or other qualified health care professional(s) managing continuing care and to the patient within 1 month of completing treatment (ONC)
